abstract: The president and his allies are trying to make Democratic plans to reform law enforcement a potent campaign issue.
lead_paragraph: Unexpectedly, the 2020 presidential campaign is drilling down on petty crime and homelessness. Donald Trump and his Republican allies are reviving law-and-order themes similar to those used effectively by Richard Nixon and Spiro Agnew in the late 1960s and early 1970s to demonize racial minorities.
